entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Race condition in building ILLink props #90702
  • [API Proposal]: Get default value of a `Type` #90697
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Assertion failed in 'System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator:PowCore during 'Generate code' #90693
    8.0.0
  • [Mono WASM + AOT] `Environment.Exit` does not work together with exception handling #90692
  • BDN randomly crashes on Linux? #90691
  • Condfig binder gen: further tighten filtering constraint for input binding method invocations #90687
    8.0.0
  • [Quality Week Design Proposal] Clean up structure of artifacts/log #90682
    Future
  • Implement memory-mapped stress log for NativeAOT #90677
    Future
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #90676
    Future
  • Move dynamic heap sample inside GC pause #90675
    Future
  • Support infinite size, commit-on-demand, NoGCRegion #90674
    Future
  • Avoid wasted commit in NoGCRegions #90672
    Future
  • [WASM] Add telemetry to track the use of WasmStripILAfterAOT #90671
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: serialize dictionary with JsonExtensionData ignores DefaultIgnoreCondition option #90670
  • NetworkStream.ReadAsync runs slower on ubuntu than on windows #90664
  • Document Networking metrics #90663
    8.0.0
  • [android] Ensure unique assembly names in runtime test bundles for android #90661
    9.0.0
  • AOT: Delegate.CreateDelegate throws attempting to JIT compile method #90660
  • Assembly.Location returns `/` instead of the actual path intermittently #90657
  • Getting 400 error when I dont pass the object property in .Net 7 API #90653

Closed

  • Logging source generator generates uncompilable code for new .NET Framework project #83393
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: (g_gc_lowest_address <= address) && (address <= g_gc_highest_address) #90447
    8.0.0
  • Awkward Time Format Patterns on Linux. No Space Before AM/PM Designator. #90627
    9.0.0
  • EventPipe support for Native AOT #83051
    8.0.0
  • [ NativeAOT ] EXEC : error : VTable of type 'ListEnumerator`1<ClassLibrary1.Foo>' not computed by the IL scanner. You can work around by running the compilation with scanner disabled. #90382
  • Timers in Blazor WebAssembly halt at specific times #90609
    7.0.x
  • Patch/hotfix for .NET 6 application unsuccessful #82273
  • InlineArray[Valid]/[Invalid] Runtime tests are failing for Mono miniJIT and interpreter #90398
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid ldp optimization with locals #85765
    8.0.0
  • Issue with DateTime.Parse in Blazor WebAssembly #89844
    6.0.x
  • [WASI] wasiconsole template: Instructions in generated README.md incorrect #90482
    8.0.0
  • Unable to inject IKeyedServiceProvider into service with .NET 8 Preview 7 #90528
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #89104
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Android] Test app crashed on exit #54911
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: the keyed service registration serviceKey non-nullable #90322
    8.0.0
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP' #89784
    9.0.0
  • R2RDump - Expand diffing functionality #10997
    Future
  • Allow StructLayoutAttribute to specify automatic size rounding up to next power of 2 for better perf #11029
    Future
  • [Question] Lazy image relocations #11244
    Future
  • OutOfMemoryException instead of OOM Killer #11300
    Future
  • [Android] Segmentation fault in libcoreclr.so #11661
    Future
  • Telemetry target fails in rc1 #90584
  • Incorrect alignment of reference struct within a struct on Mono #90531
  • ToFrozenDictionary function throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException exception in .Net 8 Pewview 7 #90567
    8.0.0
  • JsonConstructorAttribute not working for private/internal ctor in .NET 8.0 preview7 #90577
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] chrome versions #90708
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix Shuffling Thunks part 2 #90707
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add collections with all marshaller methods on the marshallers #90706
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [main] [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90705
    needs-area-label
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for ldp/stp optimizations - with test fix #90700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Revert changes to HasNativeCodeReJitAware #90696
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix PortableRuntimeIdentifierGraph.json not found during runtime repo source build #90695
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Disallow mismatched GC-ness for physical promotions #90694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make some methods public that we need to call. #90689
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement IStatefulPinnedMarshalling test marshallers #90685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [android] Switch to win 11 helix queue for devices #90683
    NO-MERGE
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing type forwards #90669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90668
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • test #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Release the stream once the response is sent #90659
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Switch fx_ver_t::as_str from stringstream to append/to_string #90652
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0][manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #90648
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Limit language version on Logger and Options source gens #90654
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Remove incorrect comments from LinkContext #90690
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Add types with marshallers that implement every method from the marshaller shapes #90634
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [GC] Use RegisterFrozenSegment for STRESS_REGIONS #90523
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90703
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90704
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for `ldp`/`stp` optimizations #90534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for `ldp`/`stp` optimizations" #90699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Collapse PortableAppWithException test app into PortableApp #90645
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Add doc for the new invoker classes #90636
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90678
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Bump package version for net7 to 7.0.11 #90651
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono] Fix InlineArray tests on android platforms #90679
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix gcroot SOS command on arm/arm64 #90658
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Add missing type forwards #90673
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Caller Allocated Buffer collection marshaller and interface #90107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add Pinned collection parameter type #90103
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix NullableAttribute illink test failures #90680
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix problems with `Assembler::ReflectionNotation()` #90655
    Servicing-approved, area-ILTools-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Performance improvements while branching during function calls #90656
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [ppc64le] Performance improvements while branching during function calls #90367
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Unify with logging category matching #90642
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90616
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq.Expressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix InlineArray tests on android platforms #90583
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90544
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix gcroot SOS command on arm/arm64 #90650
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Use browser cache in WasmApp-style projects by default #90662
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Update README.md for wasiconsole template #90538
    arch-wasm, area-Meta
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90628
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90635
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90615
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement normalization functions #90582
    os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #90585
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Re-enable tests as they are passing now #90533
    os-android
  • Add timeouts to SendReceive tests #90631
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90612
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90588
    area-Build-mono, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fix min alignment of structures with explicit layout. #90632
    area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the error register in JIT_WriteBarrier. #90568
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90606
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Fix problems with `Assembler::ReflectionNotation()` #90565
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90643
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono][ios] Revert LLVM mode for apple mobile tests #90624
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90644
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Limit language version on Logger and Options source gens #90709
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90287
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90619
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support unloadability in `Microsoft.CSharp`. #89536
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, community-contribution
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Reset OOB packages from September Release in the October Release #90561
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add a head merging transformation alongside the tail merging transformation #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Assembly resolving adjustments. #90601
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Avoid looking for dynamically accessed members when none are requested. #90154
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Prevent method to LLVM function mapping where possible #88914
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
